name: programmatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening or done according to a plan or using a particular method: The company did not adopt a programmatic approach to change, preferring evolutionary development.
using or relating to computer programs: Web services enable programmatic access to a wide variety of data over the internet.
